extendedInfo.description: Las Vegas Lottery is lottery-style scratch ticket game with so much fun: every ticket you play helps your further gaming!Feeling lucky? Can you unlock the Jewel Box ticket?Play with Las Vegas Lottery now and find out how much can you scratch. All the fun without any risk.Features:- Real touch and scratch feeling- Multiple tickets you can unlock by earning money- Instant scratch off game- Regenerating credits so you can play scratch off tickets daily- Leveling system designed to reward more if you play more- Game statistics so you can track your progress- Win and spend money, gain credits, level up, and win the grand prize!Why is it better than the other scratch-off games?Because with this game you can scratch like you would in real life. Just swipe your finger to scratch the ticket. It's that easy!This game brings you the real Las Vegas feeling, it's the perfect game if you feel bored or if you feel lucky! All the fun of a classic scratch off ticket without the risk of losing real money!If you play with games like Uno, Poker, Coin Dozer, Roulette and Slots, you'll enjoy Las Vegas Lottery!Watch out for the updates, there will be new features like lotto, keno and many more!

reviews.title: Las Vegas Lottery Scratchers
reviews.comment: I like this game! It\'s easy  to follow and it\'s fun. The game moves a little to fast. If you do use all of your coins. You can find more\342\200\246\342\200\246\342\200\246\342\200\246

reviews.title: Good and fun

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: It\'d be better if there were more games and didn\'t take 5 years to unlock them. Also it\'d be nice to have a different way to get credits

reviews.title: 2stars
reviews.comment: Needs different cards to play with. Not just one type. Also what\'s up with collecting $points and not able to use or cash in for credits. Kinda boring.

reviews.comment: Really fun, and addicting for someone who never gets to bbuy scratch tickets any more, best of all scratch games.
